nodes.text: Carl Weathers (born January 14, 1948) is an American actor and former professional football player who appears as Greef Karga in the Disney+ live-action TV series The Mandalorian. He is known for his work in Predator and the Rocky series as Apollo Creed, and also co-starred with Billy Dee Williams in the 1990 TV movie Dangerous Passion.
In 2005, Weathers had a voice role in Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction, a video game published by LucasArts.
